rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0001
rows.name:
Things like the Village Guardian
are great historical-majigs!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0002
rows.name:
And we need to take good care of
great historical-majigs!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0003
rows.name:
Uhm...I kind of did play around on top
of the Village Guardian, though...
Just don't tell anyone!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0101
rows.name:
I've been kind of scared of salvaging
ever since that monster showed up
in the middle of your lesson...

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0102
rows.name:
But Mr. Tortor says I have potential,
so I'm still working on my diving!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0103
rows.name:
He said if I show him a good dive,
he'll teach me to talk like a Nopon!
"Meheheh"...
